Contents.Content: select --病人基本信息 br.PATIENT_ID as VALUE,--病人编号 br.PATIENT_ID as INPATIENTCODE,--病人编号 br.NAME as NAME, --病人姓名 br.NAME as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.SEX as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.DATE_OF_BIRTH as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 br.AGE as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 --住院信息 zy.WARD_CODE as WARDAREA,--病区 zy.BED_NO as BEDNO --床位 from V_INFECON_PATIENTINFO br inner join V_INFECON_PATS_IN_HOSPITAL zy on br.PATIENT_ID=zy.PATIENT_ID where 1=1 {0}

select --手术信息 br.PATIENT_ID as VALUE,--病人编号 br.NAME as NAME, --病人姓名 br.NAME as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.SEX as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.DATE_OF_BIRTH as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 br.AGE as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 ss.INP_NO as MEDICALRECORDCODE, --病案号 ss.OPERATING_ROOM as OPERATIONROOM, --手术室 ss.OPERATING_DEPT as OPERATIONDEPARTMENT, --科室 ss.REQ_DATE_TIME as OPERATIONDATE, --手术时间 ss.SURGEON as OPERATIONDOCTOR, --手术医生 ss.OPERATION_NAME as OPERATIONNAME --手术名称 from V_INFECON_PATIENTINFO br left join V_INFECON_OPERATION ss on br.PATIENT_ID=ss.PATIENT_ID where 1=1 {0}

select br.PATIENT_ID as PatientID, br.NAME as PatientName, br.SEX as PatientSex, br.DATE_OF_BIRTH as PatientBirthday, br.AGE as PatientAge, br.ID_NO as PatientIDCard, br.MAILING_ADDRESS as PatientAddress,
gh.VISIT_NO as RegisterCode, gh.VISIT_DEPT_NAME as RegisterDepartment, gh.VISIT_DATE as RegisterDateTime from V_INFECON_PATIENTINFO br inner join V_INFECON_CLINIC gh on br.PATIENT_ID=gh.PATIENT_ID where 1=1 {0} order by gh.VISIT_DATE Desc

select --病人基本信息 br.PATIENT_ID as VALUE,--病人编号 br.NAME as NAME, --病人姓名 br.NAME as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.SEX as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.DATE_OF_BIRTH as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 br.AGE as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 gh.VISIT_NO as REGISTERCODE, --挂号系统编号 gh.VISIT_DATE as REGISTERDATETIME --挂号时间 from V_INFECON_PATIENTINFO br inner join V_INFECON_CLINIC gh on br.PATIENT_ID=gh.PATIENT_ID where 1=1 {0} order by gh.VISIT_DATE Desc
/*--根据工号查询登录人员信息--*/ select name from view_supply_employee where emp_sn=@emp_sn
